testAddEntitlement

public void testAddEntitlement()
                        throws java.lang.Exception
Test the addition of an entitlement to an org This code should be refactored into a business method of some sort if it becomes necessary to actually add entitlements progmatically from within the Java code. For now we need this test because new Orgs don't have any entitlements.
